content:
cfallin commented on issue #4627:

Noting so I don't forget: we should backport this to the just-branched 0.40.0 release branch as well.

cfallin commented on issue #4627:

It's been like that for ~two years, so there's no real urgency if it hasn't caused a problem so far; but I'm also a bit of an assert-correctness perfectionist so I'll go ahead and do it :-)
